QuestData.Title: Save the Children!
QuestData.Description: My poor, defenseless young students are stranded at Thal'darah Grove. With the battle raging across Battlescar Valley, they have no means of escaping. We must save the children before the Horde drops their bomb!$B$BTake my hippogryph and use it to rescue the young druids of Thal'darah Grove. Drop them off at the hippogryph post here in town.$B$BSave them all, $n! You truly are our only hope.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Master Thal'darah's Hippogryph to rescue 5 Helpless Young Druids from Thal'darah Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: Praise you, $n. The hero we have been searching for has finally arrived, and not a moment too soon.
